text.section: In this Part V of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Carrier" has the meaning stated in § 15-1301 of the Insurance Article.
"Enrollee" means an individual entitled to health benefits from a carrier.
"Physician rating system" has the meaning stated in § 15-1701 of the Insurance Article.
"Ratings examiner" means an independent entity that is approved by the Commission to review physician rating systems.
